title.narrative: Support international efforts to reduce the proliferation of Turkish Small Arms and Light Weapons (SALW) in the Western Balkans.

description.narrative: To increase knowledge and awareness of the extent to which weapons manufactured in Turkey are readily convertible to live fire, the proliferation of such weapons in crime scenes(the use by criminals) and the lessons that can be learnt for changes in the manufacture process. The aim is to work with the Turkish authorities to deliver the findings and examine ways to alter manufacturing processes so that these weapons are harder to convert. This will reduce the threat of criminal use in Turkey and across Europe. Will prevent the illicit purchase of these weapons by crime groups in Turkey. Will bring Turkey in line with more robust checks, balances and assurance processes found in similar weapons manufacture in EU.
